Keyboard Shortcuts left textboxscrollup 1 135 240 1120 700
Escape: ⤟ Previous window Cursor Keys: ∷ Select item Home: ↥ Select first item End: ↧ Select last item PageUp: ↩ Previous item page PageDown: ↪ Next item page U: ⤴ Parent folder Enter: ✓ Perform action
deepskyblue font10 skin.hassetting(#skin.keyboard.shortcuts)
Keyboard Shortcuts middle textboxscrollup 1 690 240 1120 700
P: ▶ Start playing B: ■ Stop playing Space: ⏸ Pause/Resume playing F7: ⇤ Play previous F8: ⇥ Play next F5: « Rewind F6: » FastForward R: ● Record current TV
deepskyblue font10 skin.hassetting(#skin.keyboard.shortcuts)
Keyboard Shortcuts right textboxscrollup 1 1250 240 1120 700
✚ : Volume up ➖ : Volume down M: ⊠ Mute F3: ⓘ Show info of selected item F9: ≡ Show context menu Y: ⚏ Show OSD H: ⇄ Switch Classic/Basic Home X: ⇄ Switch GUI/Fullscreen (TV/Video) F11: ⊞ Screenshot of current screen
deepskyblue font10 skin.hassetting(#skin.keyboard.shortcuts)
